td.content: s:pt says he is having symptoms of Liver 11-12 times a week, in spite of treatment. he is a white male aged 30 years. denies any alcohol use smokes one pack/day o:Height 174 cm, Weight 61.9 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Hepatitis B p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to internal medicine.
